Happy First Vezina Day, Igor!
@jondoeski I have news for you...decisions like that aren't always solely made by the head coach.
@jondoeski Guy was a Jack Adams finalist in his first season. 0.0% chance.
@Philzfacts @JonnieBravo_13 And there will be plenty more teams to do it which is why the obvious play would be to match
@Philzfacts @JonnieBravo_13 You're just being silly if you think that's what the entire league has him pegged as and you know it

@Philzfacts @JonnieBravo_13 Still better than offer sheet compensation. Plenty of teams will jump on a #2 locked up at a mediocre ticket for upside alone. He's 21. Bottom half of the league would be all over him.

@Philzfacts @JonnieBravo_13 Match then trade.

Like I said, common sense.
@Philzfacts @JonnieBravo_13 Nothing's changed. Even if he doesn't have a future here it's still common sense asset management. Get more back trading him under contract than offer sheet compensation.
#NYR Twitter https://t.co/ym044dDmc0
@leland1321 History never changes. My bad.
@KingCementality *5-3

Obviously nothing is guaranteed in the future - but it's common knowledge most championship teams don't just wake up a championship team.

They pay dues, take lumps and learn how to win.

Once again, it doesn't mean a Cup is inevitable - but the #NYR just crammed a ton of Step 1.
If I was at that MSG viewing party and the Lightning took the lead before the fucking goal song even finished I'd be splattered on the ice
So now...
#NYR Cinderella Run Ends At The Hands Of Another Lightning MasterClass https://t.co/x4L3uxVWoZ
Big fan. https://t.co/DRQRuaFB79

It was an unexpected but unbelievable ride. Simply ran out of gas and into the two-time defending Cup champs playing peak championship hockey - but these #NYR have a bright, bright future.

Sucks now but the payoff is coming. Sooner than we thought. https://t.co/lrrmgdAhO6
These fucking Bolts are unbelievable
https://t.co/R78YjgyKia
Um what?
FRANK THE TANK WE'RE NOT DEAD YET LET'S GOOOOOOO https://t.co/mmT2BJP8kb

Atta boy Laf way to try and take over. PP is gonna get another crack here, maybe the last.

Gotta have it.
Well that won't cut it fellas
https://t.co/rge6KdEO5d
@yahoo302 @Lkay_398 @SammmyStern I dunno what's going on here but hi guys
@myownburneracnt The point of my tweet was essentially "we need a prayer". It def wasn't "we got this" haha

It's not denial.

It's rooting for my team until the end.

It's 1-0. https://t.co/fxtcKo0Hho
Operation: Get One For Igor now an all hands on deck emergency for the third

@BarstoolChief Puck there, already in position for the hit. I'm not saying it's not debatable - but this is a legit millisecond of play at game speed. The slo-mo and selective freeze frames are overdramatic. https://t.co/AvNJJgQuvb
Oh boy...
https://t.co/d29ixgCrFh
If it was so obvious everyone wouldn't be sharing only slo-mo and freeze frames. Game speed tweets wouldn't serve the Trouba narrative. https://t.co/O0XKqx8WOU
Love the freeze frames - like the pass wasn't rocketed across the rink and skipped by Perry a millisecond before contact https://t.co/HSApYN4FUA
CHOO CHOOOOOO https://t.co/CgE5L2n6pP
Nothing high about that shut your fucking face Ray
Oh my God Igor https://t.co/IkuDYtgws0
I see we're picking up right where we left off...
#WinningNYRHockey https://t.co/wvZYcVMQCK

Oh zero chance he's healthy - but his decision making has to change to accommodate whatever's ailing him. Obviously easier said than done when you've become a superstar playing one way but he simply has to. https://t.co/IBqFszwxDu

And that's what makes Panarin a more glaring problem. He can't be doing what he keeps trying because A) TB jumps to the spot before he does it at this point and B) Strome doesn't have the wheels for it even if it works. https://t.co/PW3NDN7pTC

They survived the period.

They shouldn't have.

This is how about 40 #NYR wins between the regular season and playoffs have been scripted.
I love you. https://t.co/pGIJjNb7wS
EVERYBODY KNOWS WHAT YOU'RE GONNA DO EVERY TIME ARTEMI
No idea why the one line GG kept together is the Strome line. Been giveaway machines with their overpassing and hope plays for a while now. I'm losing my shit here.
I'm telling you this is peak winning Rangers hockey https://t.co/PNn1d7JsPD

These clearing attempts so far are laugh out loud bad.

I'm not even yelling.

I'm cackling.
Bingo. https://t.co/hQXs1RYd2f
I know this makes no sense but the #NYR look terrible and I like it.
OK how was Braun skating 78mph to get back on that 2-on-1 and why doesn't he skate like that constantly? I had to do a double take on the jersey number.

Rooney and Motte have a bit of skill. I just don't get how Kakko wouldn't fit. That's a pretty solid trio for 8 minutes.

Whatever.

Win.
#NYR Twitter is gonna pop the fuck off if Hunt's overexcited "aggressiveness and forechecking" catches him two minutes
@ScottIlliano Well I mean I don't care if my team's coach agrees with Twitter or the media haha just get a win.
@NYRGrady I get it - but a win is a win and there's just no real way to say it would've been with a different lineup. Hypothesize all we want but it's simply results now.
@ScottIlliano Of course - but no one's got a better pulse on his guys than the coach. Obviously he's not trying to lose. Fingers crossed.
@the_teknic If they win it's the right move period. That's all it's about right now.

#NYR win 2-1 on an ugly Hunt goal and a Strome OTGWG

Obviously

Safe to say no one would've made all the exact changes GG made so it's a HUGE night for the "oh you think you're smarter than an NHL head coach???" side of the argument.

I hope we all look dumb.
Gerard Gallant: https://t.co/fP5vDG7Lfy

Wow.

There's no reason he can't skate on the 4th line over Hunt. He's not a defensive liability and fourth lines don't just have to "bang".

No room in new look top 9, fine, but he should be in. Period. https://t.co/L3PHaaTYqZ
@mantrain88 Oh that's def best case scenario haha I'm here for Chytil/Kreider lovefest

@19Messier94 Which is exactly why everyone's got new linemates. Logic dictates that stuff should lessen because you usually only do that stuff when you've developed chemistry.

Flipside though is obviously everyone trying to get their linemates looks and be "unselfish". We'll see.

Forget if I heard it on TV or radio today but someone made a good point.

Changing up the lines doesn't necessarily require instant chemistry. It usually means everyone will play a simpler, more straightforward brand of hockey. Not looking for the cute stuff because you're comfy.

I mean they def needed a new look but I don't think I would've come up with these lines in 20 tries.

GG throwing his nuts on the table tonight. https://t.co/bPjCQIDTuc
Oh. https://t.co/5J7vMJsJQp
@andrusha44 My bad on the yellow but I don't feel like changing it on my phone haha but zoom in. https://t.co/wrnWKIJFnk
#NYR Find Themselves In A Familiar Fight For Their Playoff Lives https://t.co/zhgSlxr5pg
https://t.co/kdAt5c6fn2
https://t.co/U1RWo2C633
@andrusha44 I'll hold your hand through it with my spreadsheet later. At a tournament now. Then you'll understand. I promise.
@andrusha44 It does. Look at my second tweet following the first one. I did the math. Believe what you want.
@BroadwayCJ97 Did you check the second tweet? I went spreadsheet mode. It works.
@andrusha44 Make a spreadsheet like I did. It works. I didn't just pull it out of my ass haha

I have a scorching hot take...

If Brayden Point comes back this series, he inherently makes TB more of a speed/skill team that can result in the "back & forth" being ramped up a bit.

Obviously the Bolts can win that way too, but that style is certainly more up the #NYR alley.

@thereallj915 Short-term all-situations 3C who's sole goal is to win and can be had for a discount. And remember he's the secondary piece - you're looking at a guy like Stastny because you just added Patrick Kane and have a limited budget.

@AndrewVan @gogrady24 So Kane won't leave Chicago during an all-out rebuild but Bergeron is gonna leave a competitive Boston squad? For a discount too?

You've lost your mind haha

@AndrewVan @gogrady24 That's just plain incorrect.

Have a good weekend man

@AndrewVan @gogrady24 You won't have to overpay to get Kane man.

He's got a no-move clause. He's only going where he wants to. If he chooses NY, Chicago either takes whatever they'll offer or they get nothing and lose Kane to free agency after next season.

@610Barstool I bet it the day before you tweeted that and tripled down 1 minute after I saw your tweet confirming that those odds were in fact bananaland value. Thank u. Happy pay day https://t.co/b4XoErGkHp
@610Barstool Oh like start of the year?
@610Barstool That’s todays odds?
+2000 for Vezina is bananaland value https://t.co/lGe3pAUR0V
@610Barstool What a splendid day to cash our futures 😎

DeBrincat trade news got me thinking...

#NYR can't afford his future QO - but if he goes, gotta figure Kane goes too and at half his cap hit he can fit.

How do we like Kane & a cheaper C over a longer 2C commitment? Example:

20-93-13
10-72-P Kane
21-Paul Stastny-24
91-76-75/29
@610Barstool
@610Barstool Well I’m not totally convinced.  The boys over achieved and that had little to do with GG.  Scratching Kakko was indefensibly wrong.  You don’t do that with a 20 year old.
Trying to get someone’s take on the possibility that GG gets canned (Drury cutthroat), but no one will bite.  What do you reckon @610Barstool ?
@610Barstool @JonnieBravo_13 Griffin Reinhart….marry yourself to a draft position and you end up getting fucked Carolina is learning this the hard way with Kotkaniemi.
@610Barstool @JonnieBravo_13 4.2 is expensive for a 4th line grinder.

@610Barstool @JonnieBravo_13 Just wait til JD gets him on the phone with Laine to talk up Columbus, also at 4.2 his trade value is meh at best bc any team could hold the Rangers over a barrel and the kid just isn’t good yet.
@610Barstool @JonnieBravo_13 If he signs an offer sheet then nothing you could do about it other than match or pass, at 4.2 you guys would be fucked
@610Barstool @JonnieBravo_13 Still a no brainer?
@610Barstool Make it 5-2 and enjoy your offseason
@610Barstool Bright future lol. 11.6mil on a 30+ year old who fell off a cliff when it matters and Trouba on a 8mil AAV contact. No future when you have those 2 contracts simple.
@Lkay_398 @SammmyStern https://t.co/VjHekBYirc
@610Barstool I’m rooting. But there’s nothing wrong with saying they’re flat and we need a prayer
@610Barstool They have nothing left in the tank and no magic in the emergency tank. You e been in denial about it, but hard to anything but pray at this point
@610Barstool Sir…
Ya that might’ve been interference  https://t.co/JR9EEligot
@RearAdBsBlog Ridiculous that interference isn’t called https://t.co/bi1HToE7t8
@610Barstool I mean. Igor is the only reason it’s not 4-0.
@610Barstool He’s gotta be hurt, he doesn’t drive to the net or have that first stride speed he’s always had.
@610Barstool It’s a shooting gallery every time that line is out there. It’s so obvious strome can barely move, why he’s playing is beyond me.
@610Barstool When is tampa PP over? My god
@610Barstool It's what we're most used to from 82 games: look bad but win.
@610Barstool No one other than him was clamoring for this or even thinking it as a possibility 🤞

@610Barstool Thing is, they can totally win a game on the backs of the usual suspects: Igor, Mika, Kreider.  And if that's what they do, the mouthbreathers will still be saying how smart Gallant was lol
@610Barstool He’s certainly opened himself up to significant second guessing if KK is not injured
@610Barstool If they win, but Hunt costs us 2 goals and we barely squeak it out... it was still dumb.
Only way we're dumb is if Hunt and Rooney play better than Kakko has. You ice the best team. https://t.co/EATsZlKZUZ
Official: Kaapo Kakko will be scratched for Game 6 #NYR
@610Barstool For sure, but there's that thought in the back of your head thinking "what if this is THE line?"
@610Barstool This is all well and good, but whens the last time the team played without the cute crap? It’s their biggest detriment.

I mean they def needed a new look but I don't think I would've come up with these lines in 20 tries.

GG throwing his nuts on the table tonight. https://t.co/bPjCQIDTuc

#NYR pregame rushes from Tampa:

Laf - Zibanejad - Vatrano
Panarin - Copp - Kakko
Kreider - Chytil - Goodrow
Motte - Rooney - Hunt 

Lindgren - Fox
Miller - Trouba
Braun - Schneider

Igor
Looks like Ryan Strome will be scratched (possibly still dealing with that lower-body injury), which means Kakko, Hunt and Rooney will all play #NYR
@andrusha44 I'll hold your hand through it with my spreadsheet later. At a tournament now. Then you'll understand. I promise.

@610Barstool Do you understand that there is only $14 mil available, if you let every UFA walk, clear Nemith, Geo, Hunt? If you pay Kane $5 mil that leaves $9? Kappo/Blase, that’s about $4.5. How in a world you find room for another center, if you need to sign 6 more players for under $4.5?

@610Barstool Math does not work. You need to re-sign Kappo and Blays. That alone makes it impossible. Then   cap room is needed for a backup, 6th/7th d-man, three 4th liners, black ace. Much rather re-sign Motte and Copp, instead of 1 year of a 35 year old Kane.
@610Barstool Im not sure how we can afford that

@610Barstool There is no way this will ever work with the cap room Rangers have. Kane’s cap hit is $10 mil. Even at 1/2, it is still $5 mil. Even if you clear all those salaries, Rangers will only have about $14 mil. Any decent C will be over $3 mil. How does the math work, then?
@610Barstool Two last minute goals by Tampa and they have simplified their game screen the goalie, shot, and get away with as much as they can physically
@610Barstool Just love that he’s tough, plays wing and center. But I think Kane for a year might be our best bet at maximizing this window of everyone on ELC’s depending what they give up

@thereallj915 Short-term all-situations 3C who's sole goal is to win and can be had for a discount. And remember he's the secondary piece - you're looking at a guy like Stastny because you just added Patrick Kane and have a limited budget.

@610Barstool I admittedly know very little other than he was awesome in STL and early in WPG. I just see a teams like Carolina, Florida and Toronto and think getting older and slower might not be the best way to keep pace with them as their windows stay open

@610Barstool @gogrady24 Give financial insensitive if keeping the face of the dynasty around plus the fact that given there roster they still may try to compete cough Seth Jones contract they may try to keep him around not like Kane has to go ring chasing if I’d personally prefer Bergeron on 2x6ish
@610Barstool @gogrady24 Most of these Centers were talking about are project to get around the same amount AAV that we’d pay for one year of Kane
@610Barstool @gogrady24 I’d rather address these needs in free agency or at next years deadline then sell of quality assets to get Kane who you’ll have to over pay at this point to get
